title: I don't understand this community
body:
You can't even have some humorous banter with someone without being called toxic.

I was playing a game as soraka, and this azir was one. auto-attack. away. from dieing, and in my greedy attempt to kill him by right clicking, i ended up dieing myself. Like blown right up from 100-0. Anyways, continuing on, after i died i all-chatted, "JUST DIE WOULD YOU"
following this game a member of my team told me i was way too toxic. because that ^^^^ really bothered them. Like, seriously? It's a joke. because he got away. and i died. 

It's on online, world-wide (area-specific) MOBA. and people think THAT is toxic? I've played a few games lately with people who call my teammates pieces of shit, %%%%%%s, and everything else in the book, but I'm apparently too toxic, and it's just blasphemous that I'm a girl who could rage that much. 

............................................................................

I'm so at a loss for words. The sad thing is, this isn't the first time this has happened. I don't cuss at people, i don't call them names, i don't tell them where they can put their genitals, heh, but people throw around the word toxic and always report you for nothing. It's like people really don't know what toxic is, like at all.

and the even SADDER part is, i've actually received these "automated punishments" in the past because the system just adds up number of reports and slaps punishments on you while no one is actually reviewing them. Why even have a chat system  if you can't say anything at all without the community flipping the fuck out? It's getting really old.

replies.body: That's why I just avoid talking. It's only safe to joke around if someone started it before you.

I wish i could tell you how sad this makes me ._. It would be awesome to make some league friends to play and dick around with since i know almost no one in real life that plays, too bad that will....probably never happen.

There's nice people in the community. Rare to come across, but they're around. You could also drag your real life friends into this craphole of a community. :D I could be your friend but I'm low-elo...you could vent to me though! Or dick around.

Very few people are cool in this game. I remember I was playing Talon once and i died killing the enemy Graves and I typed, "Worth" into all chat. Apparently me saying my life was worth Graves was the worst thing ever told to this guy and he raged at me, his team and even typed d worth when he killed minions.

He went off the bars for me just causally saying "worth"
Less people would play if they didn't have a chat system. That's why. Lyte even suggested himself that people not use it.

i guess so. I love to talk and communicate and banter, but good lord, it's virtually impossible these days. 

It's like a game form of political correctness and it's cancer and kills everything it touches.
